page.title: 06RECREATION
page.content: MOST OF THE PEOPLE WHO DO RECREATION IN THE AREA DO SPORT SUCH AS FOOTBALL AND CRICKET.THERE IS A VILLAGE FOOTBALL TEAM AND A VILLAGE CRICKET TEAM . THERE ARE SOME PEOPLE WHO GO SHOOTING FOR BIRDS BUT AS THERE IS NO RIVER OR STREAM OR CANAL PEOPLE CAN NOT GO FISHING IN OUR ACTUAL AREA. BECAUSE THE COUNTRY SIDE IS VERY RELAXING, SOME PEOPLE SPEND THEIR SPARE TIME GOING ON LONG WALKS. ALSO MANY PEOPLE HAVE LARGE GARDENS AND SPEND A LOT OF TIME TENDING THEM. APART FROM THESE TYPES OF LEISURE PURSUITS, THERE IS NOT A GREAT DEAL TO DO IN OUR AREA ESPECIALLY FOR YOUNGER PEOPLE.
